Name: Drawing From Memory
About the game: Drawing from Memory is an online party game where you and 2-4 friends try to figure out what your most and least favorite characters look like by Drawing them from Memory. 1. Invite your friends. 2. Pick a character to draw. 3. You (and your friends) try to draw this character from memory. 4. Find out this is harder than you thought. 5. Doubt yourself. 6. Time is up! Submit your drawing. 7. See what your friends drew. 8. Doubt yourself. 9. Vote on your favorite drawing. 10. :) TWITCH INTERGRATION - Activate the TWITCH VOTES function and let your live chat vote on what they think is the best drawing! - Use ROOM CODES to play with your viewers.
